channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 私募股权基金 CVC 为其第六只亚洲基金融资 68 亿美元
item.description: Private equity fund CVC raises $6.8 bln for its sixth Asia fund reut.rs/4bMivBi

item.title: 阿布扎比第一银行开始出售 5 年期债务 - IFR
item.description: First Abu Dhabi Bank starts selling 5-year debt - IFR reut.rs/3uGayg4

item.title: Glencore称，大宗商品价格下跌使该公司去年的盈利减少了一半，仅略高于170亿美元。但与力拓不同的是，该公司削减了对投资者的派息。更多信息
item.description: Glencore said lower commodity prices halved its earnings last year, pushing them down to just over $17 billion. But unlike Rio Tinto, the company slashed its payout to investors. Read more reut.rs/3UMiNBQ

item.title: 观看：亚马逊将加入道琼斯工业平均指数，从下周起取代沃尔格林博姿联盟。此举有望增加消费者零售业以及道琼斯工业平均指数中其他领域的投资。
item.description: WATCH: Amazon is set to join the Dow Jones Industrial Average, replacing Walgreens Boots Alliance effective next week. The move is expected to increase consumer retail exposure as well as other areas in the Dow reut.rs/42OXJwv

item.title: 汇丰银行公布全年利润大增 78%，利率收益创下历史新高，但由于在一家中国银行的股权出现巨额减值，利润未能达到预期。更多信息
item.description: HSBC reported a 78% jump in full-year profit, a record high gain on interest rates, but missed forecasts as it was hit by a hefty impairment from its stake in a Chinese bank. Read more reut.rs/3I7xg3R

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：Capital One 和 Discover 的合并将在美国信用卡市场创造一个新的巨无霸。但政府对 "垃圾收费 "的打击可能会威胁到未来的盈利能力，@johnsfoley 解释道。
item.description: From @Breakingviews: The Capital One and Discover merger will create a new behemoth in the US credit card market. But the government’s war against ‘junk fees’ could threaten future profitability, explains @johnsfoley

item.title: 汇丰银行 30 亿美元中国减记损了创纪录的年度利润
item.description: HSBC's $3 billion China writedown mars record annual profit reut.rs/49mUgaW

item.title: 观看：沃尔玛以强劲的第四季度业绩拉开了美国零售商报告季的序幕，此前受通胀挤压的购物者纷纷涌入沃尔玛商店，沃尔玛还表示将以 23 亿美元收购智能电视制造商 Vizio。
item.description: WATCH: Walmart kicked off US retailers' reporting season with robust fourth quarter results after inflation-squeezed shoppers flocked to its stores and said it would buy smart-TV maker Vizio for $2.3 billion reut.rs/3I79ZyY

item.title: 阿布扎比第一银行开始出售 5 年期债务 - IFR
item.description: First Abu Dhabi Bank starts selling 5-year debt - IFR reut.rs/3T6hzQK

item.title: 观看：亚马逊将加入道琼斯工业平均指数，取代沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance），下周生效。消息公布后，亚马逊股价在盘后交易中上涨了 1.3%，而沃尔格林则下跌了 3%。
item.description: WATCH: Amazon is set to join the Dow Jones Industrial Average, replacing Walgreens Boots Alliance effective next week. The shares of Amazon rose 1.3% in extended trade after the announcement, while Walgreens dipped 3% reut.rs/42OXJwv

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Thoma Bravo 考虑以 80 亿美元出售 J.D. Power
item.description: Thoma Bravo weighs $8 bln sale of J.D. Power, Bloomberg reports reut.rs/3SKZTsr

item.title: 日经指数（Nikkei）攀升至接近历史最高点，标志着日本股市已走出投资荒野，资金、势头和日本企业变革的迹象使日本股市重回全球投资组合之首。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: The Nikkei's climb to within striking distance of a record high marks Japanese stocks' long walk out of the investment wilderness as money, momentum and signs of change in corporate Japan put the market back atop global portfolios. More here: reut.rs/3UR164b

item.title: 新加坡航空公司（Singapore Airlines）警告称，由于成本上升，机票价格面临压力，该公司股价下跌近 10%，为新加坡航展 #SGAirshow2024 蒙上阴影。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: A warning from home carrier Singapore Airlines that ticket prices were coming under pressure as costs are also rising sent its shares down nearly 10%, casting a shadow over the Singapore Airshow #SGAirshow2024. More here: reut.rs/3UMWSuz

item.title: 去年，西班牙人在家中安装太阳能电池板的数量有所下降，这是自2018年以来的首次下降，因为补贴的影响逐渐减弱，而今年的前景则比较稳定。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description: The number of Spaniards installing solar panels on their homes fell last year, the first decline since 2018 as the impact of subsidies faded, while the outlook for this year is steady. More here: reut.rs/3SIQrpH

item.title: 无法在家中安装充电器的电动汽车驾驶员转而求助于美国和欧洲公司提供的临时充电器，以替代通常昂贵或不方便的公共充电站。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Electric vehicle drivers unable to install a charger at home are turning instead to stopgaps offered by US and European firms as alternatives to often expensive or inconvenient public charging points. More here: reut.rs/4bHFQ73

item.title: 十多位业内人士表示，Shein 和 Temu 等快速时尚电子商务零售商的迅速崛起正在颠覆全球航空货运业，因为它们越来越多地争夺有限的航空货运空间，以快速的转运时间吸引消费者。
item.description: The rapid rise of fast-fashion e-commerce retailers such as Shein and Temu is upending the global air cargo industry, as they increasingly vie for limited air-cargo space to woo consumers with rapid transit times, more than ten industry sources said reut.rs/4bNjd0Q

item.title: 观看：美国股市收盘下跌，纳斯达克指数跌幅最大，原因是芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）在备受期待的财报发布前表现不佳
item.description: WATCH: US stocks ended lower with the Nasdaq showing the largest declines as chipmaker Nvidia stumbled ahead of its highly awaited earnings report reut.rs/3SO9zCr

item.title: 日本瑞穗力争保持全球十大投资银行地位
item.description: Japan's Mizuho aims to remain a top 10 global investment bank reut.rs/4a0cIq7

item.title: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士称，印度市场监管机构已初步认定 Zee Entertainment Enterprises 账目上的 2.4 亿美元被挪用，Zee Group 创始人已被传唤接受质询。
item.description: India's market regulator has made a preliminary finding that $240 million has been diverted out of Zee Entertainment Enterprises' books, and Zee Group founders have been called in for questioning, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said reut.rs/3wloPPH

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：Capital One 希望利用 Discover 的支付系统，因为两家公司的合并将造就一个信用卡巨头。从政府到银行监管机构，@johnsfoley 解释了它可能面临的挑战
item.description: From @Breakingviews: Capital One will hope to leverage Discover’s payment system as merger of the two companies creates a credit card giant. From the government to banking regulators, @johnsfoley explains the challenges it could face

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Thoma Bravo 考虑以 80 亿美元出售 J.D. Power
item.description: Thoma Bravo weighs $8 bln sale of J.D. Power, Bloomberg reports reut.rs/3OM43iQ

item.title: 观看：巴克莱银行（Barclays）制定了一项三年计划来重振其低迷的股价，包括削减成本和向股东返还 126 亿美元。巴克莱银行的年度利润下降了 6%，降至 83 亿美元。
item.description: WATCH: Barclays laid out a three-year plan to revive its flagging share price, including axing costs and returning $12.6 billion to shareholders. The strategy update came as it reported a 6% fall in annual profit to $8.3 billion reut.rs/49lix1g

item.title: Breakingviews - 阿里巴巴是逆向投资中国的终极赌注
item.description: Breakingviews - Alibaba is the ultimate contrarian China bet reut.rs/3wmsv3Q reut.rs/3wmsv3Q

item.title: 花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽 2023 年薪酬上调 6% 至 2,600 万美元
item.description: Citigroup raises CEO Jane Fraser's 2023 pay by 6% to $26 million reut.rs/48pctTW

item.title: 观看：中国宣布下调基准房贷利率，这是中国有史以来最大的一次降息，中国政府试图以此支撑陷入困境的房地产市场和整体经济。
item.description: WATCH: China announced its biggest ever reduction in the benchmark mortgage rate, as authorities sought to prop up the struggling property market and the broader economy reut.rs/42JhoxS

item.title: 汉莎航空地勤人员在主要机场举行了本月第二次罢工，增加了周三将继续进行的工资谈判的压力。
item.description: Lufthansa’s ground staff walked off the job at major airports in their second strike this month, raising pressure in wage talks due to continue on Wednesday reut.rs/3I65cxN

item.title: 观看：投资者对英伟达即将公布的季度财报能否证明其高昂的估值合理表示担忧，英伟达的股价在纳斯达克指数中大幅下挫
item.description: WATCH: Nvidia weighed heavily on the Nasdaq as investors showed concern over whether its upcoming quarterly earnings will justify its expensive valuation reut.rs/3SO9zCr

item.title: 日本瑞穗力争保持全球十大投资银行地位
item.description: Japan's Mizuho aims to remain a top 10 global investment bank reut.rs/3T6i8tN

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：Capital One 与 Discover 800 亿美元的合并将在美国信用卡市场上创造一个新的顶级企业。但这也带来了一系列挑战，@johnsfoley 解释道
item.description: From @Breakingviews: The Capital One-Discover $80 billion merger will create a new top player in the US credit card market. But it comes with its own set of challenges, @johnsfoley explains

item.title: Breakingviews - 标准普尔的 "可视阿尔法 "交易忽略了胖手指的缺陷
item.description: Breakingviews - S&P’s Visible Alpha deal ignores fat finger flubs reut.rs/3I7BwR2 reut.rs/3I7BwR2
